Context:
The Text provides information about the TLC (The Learning Commons) at George Brown College. It offers both in-person and online tutoring for students. Students can access various academic support services to develop core skills needed for success in their courses. Services are provided by a team of TLC Advisors and trained and certified TLC Peer Tutors. The text also provides contact information including phone number, email address, and social media hub links. Additionally, it mentions that the information on the website is subject to change without notice and encourages students to verify college fee requirements. No specific programs offered by the college are mentioned in the text.

EXTRACTED INFORMATION:
- TLC offers in-person and online tutoring
- Provides academic support for George Brown College students
- Services provided by a team of TLC Advisors and trained and certified TLC Peer Tutors
- Contact Information: 416-415-2000, ask.george@georgebrown.ca, Social Media Hub
- Website information is subject to change without notice
- Students responsible for verifying college fee requirements.
